text: Patriarch Mark may refer to: * Patriarch Mark I of Alexandria, ruled in 43–68 * Mark II of Constantinople, Ecumenical Patriarch in 1465–1466 * Patriarch Mark III of Alexandria, Greek Patriarch of Alexandria in 1180–1209 * Patriarch Mark IV of Alexandria, Greek Patriarch of Alexandria in 1385–1389 * Patriarch Mark V of Alexandria, Greek Patriarch of Alexandria in 1425–1435 * Patriarch Mark VI of Alexandria, Greek Patriarch of Alexandria in 1459–1484
title: Patriarch Mark
